headline: US rig count up five as prices slide
summary: The rig count in the Permian Basin was up one this week, the latest count Friday by Baker Hughes shows, with 254 rigs active in the region. A year ago, 303 rigs were active in the region. Nationally, the oil and gas rig count is up five from last week at 554 rigs. A year ago, 583 rigs were active. The count shows that 419 rigs sought oil, up two from the previous week, and 127 explored for ...
